author: Source: Information Technology
title: New My Book Pro Is WD's Fastest External Solution - Information Technology
text:
"The My Book Pro device has been designed from the ground up for the creative professional workflow.i 1 2 We've been able to take the newest, highest capacity 6 TB 7200 RPM drives on the market and marry them with leading technologies to deliver a product you can leverage from the moment you connect it," said , vice president of marketing for WD's Content Solutions business. "It really is designed to perform under the most demanding environments."
Start the conversation, or Read more at Information Technology.
